lead_paragraph: World rugby's ruling body has criticised the handling of the concussion suffered by Northampton's George North against Leicester this month, saying that he should have left the field immediately and not returned.

headline.print_headline: World Rugby Criticises Handling of North Concussion
headline.main: World Rugby Criticises Handling of North Concussion
